insert into we_user (user_id, head_image_url, user_name, alias, gender, mobile, email, wx_account, department, `position`, is_leader_in_dept, join_time, enable, id_card, qq_account, telephone, address, birthday, remark, is_activate,create_by,update_by,create_time,update_time) values
( #{weUser.userId},#{weUser.headImageUrl},#{weUser.name},#{weUser.alias},#{weUser.gender},#{weUser.mobile}, #{weUser.email},#{weUser.wxAccount},#{weUser.department},#{weUser.position},#{weUser.isLeaderInDept}, #{weUser.joinTime},#{weUser.enable},#{weUser.idCard},#{weUser.qqAccount},#{weUser.telephone},#{weUser.address}, #{weUser.birthday},#{weUser.remark},#{weUser.isActivate}, #{weUser.createBy},#{weUser.updateBy},#{weUser.createTime},#{weUser.updateTime} )
on duplicate key update head_image_url= values(head_image_url), user_name= values(user_name),alias= values(alias), mobile= values(mobile),email= values(email), wx_account= values(wx_account),department= values(department), position= values(position),is_leader_in_dept= values(is_leader_in_dept), enable= values(enable),id_card= values(id_card),qq_account= values(qq_account), telephone= values(telephone),address= values(address), birthday= values(birthday),remark= values(remark), is_activate= values(is_activate), update_by= values(update_by), update_time= values(update_time)
mapper.select:
SELECT wu.user_id, wu.user_name, wu.dimission_time, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(wd.`name`) FROM we_department wd WHERE wd.id=wu.department) as department, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM we_allocate_customer wac WHERE wac.handover_userid=wu.user_id) as allocateCustomerNum, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM we_allocate_group wag WHERE wag.old_owner=wu.user_id) as allocateGroupNum FROM we_user wu
and wu.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND date_format(wu.dimission_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(wu.dimission_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and wu.is_activate = #{isActivate} and wu.is_allocate = #{isAllocate}
SELECT wu.user_name, wu.user_id, wu.head_image_url, wfcr.create_time FROM `we_flower_customer_rel` wfcr INNER JOIN we_user wu ON wfcr.user_id = wu.user_id WHERE wfcr.external_userid=#{externalUserid}
